overview: The film featuring Mahesh and debutant Shalu Chourasiya was shot in early 2018, with director Ram Sevaa making his second film after the unreleased Tea Kadai Bench.The director based the story of the film on a real life incident that he had witnessed in the 1990 s, and completed the shoot of the film within 23 days. The film's music is composed by Amresh Ganesh, and prior to release, Mahesh highlighted it as a major selling point of the film.
title: En Kaadhali Scene Podura
